general_advisory: Sow wheat and corn in well-drained soil. Be mindful of weather conditions before planting.

advisory: Plant wheat in well-drained soil for optimal growth
Ensure proper watering during dry periods
Protect wheat from pests and diseases by applying recommended treatments
Plant corn seeds at the recommended depth for best germination
Provide adequate nutrients to corn plants throughout the growing season
Monitor corn for signs of disease and take appropriate action
